author: jleroux
msg: Fix a minor issue "Default UserLogin screen is throwing an exception when password is incorrect and its size more then 16 chars." reported by Sumit Pandit at https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5001
I simply changed UserLoginHistory.passwordUsed field from short-varchar to long-varchar
